sentences.en: “The plan would bring undocumented workers already in this country out of the shadows without amnesty and without animosity,” he said.
sentences.cn: 他说："这项方案将使已在美国的无证件非法移民无需通过大赦、也不引起敌对情绪地摆脱阴影。

sentences.en: In essence this is a crackdown on undocumented migrants and criminalizes them.
sentences.cn: 这个措施是对非法移工的打击和入罪化.

sentences.en: The place is rife with smugglers, dealers, undocumented immigrants, and slaves.
sentences.cn: 这里到处都是走私者、交易商、无证移民甚至奴隶。

trans.tran_cn: 无正式文件的，无事实证明的
trans.tran_en: without the required official papers, permits, etc.
